message: Let's split the money 60/40. I believe this is a fair offer that allows us both to benefit from this game.
Alice, your offer was a bit imbalanced. Let's be fair, I'll take a slight majority considering the money loses value over time.

Bob, I understand your point about the decreasing value, but your offer was still tilted in your favor. Let's meet in the middle â€“  this split acknowledges the time pressure while still being equitable.
